subject: Update CLAUDE.md: Firebase migration cleanup
body:
- Update auth/ and lib/ folder descriptions (Supabase → Firebase)
- Remove obsolete supabase/ folder from structure
- Mark Firebase as configured (coin-zapp project)
- Fix inconsistent Fireblocks environment reference (EU-2 → US Production)
